snippet.title: Gameboy Longplay [166] Waterworld
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Mad-Matt

Maybe the best version of the game but that's not really saying much.  The game has a few different modes of play to keep things interesting and just like other versions which introduce Enola, this one skips over that aspect of the films plot line and just sticks to killing all the smokers. This version actually has an intro and outro which the others didn't do very well at all.

Some nice music and really makes me think that the musician was writing it for the Spectrum ;) -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
